text: Soni Allah agumbile chiumbe chilichose chakuulukutaga kuumila mâ€™mesi. Sano ine mwa yalakweyo ikwenda chamakuku, soni ine mwa yalakweyo pana yaikwenda ni ngongolo siwili, nambo soni ine mwa yalakweyo pana yaikwenda ni ngongolo ncheche. Allah akasagumba chaakusaka. Chisimu Allah pa chindu chilichose awele Jwakombola
